html: We must create a culture of accountability at all colleges and universities. The entire school—including those at the very top of the administration—must take responsibility for the college’s value to students and taxpayers.
text: We must create a culture of accountability at all colleges and universities. The entire school—including those at the very top of the administration—must take responsibility for the college’s value to students and taxpayers.

html: Three for-profit college chains have collapsed in recent months, leaving students with worthless or nonexistent credits and degrees. That's why it's now more important than ever that the #HigherEd Act protects students and taxpayers from risky, profit-motivated operations.
text: Three for-profit college chains have collapsed in recent months, leaving students with worthless or nonexistent credits and degrees. That's why it's now more important than ever that the #HigherEd Act protects students and taxpayers from risky, profit-motivated operations.

html: There are so many different types of schools and students who attend them. We must ensure that our reauthorization of the Higher Education Act includes an accountability system that is as nuanced as our schools and our students.
text: There are so many different types of schools and students who attend them. We must ensure that our reauthorization of the Higher Education Act includes an accountability system that is as nuanced as our schools and our students.

html: In addition to the almost $130 billion spent by taxpayers in higher education—students and families invest immense time and financial resources. We must ensure colleges are being held accountable for student success.
text: In addition to the almost $130 billion spent by taxpayers in higher education—students and families invest immense time and financial resources. We must ensure colleges are being held accountable for student success.

html: I’m going to keep fighting to ensure the @NLRB and the @USEEOC represent all voices—not just those of corporations. I urge every man, woman, and worker who believes that workers should have a voice to join me.
text: I’m going to keep fighting to ensure the @NLRB and the @USEEOC represent all voices—not just those of corporations. I urge every man, woman, and worker who believes that workers should have a voice to join me.

html: As our nation is grappling with how to address the epidemic of sexual assault & harassment in the workplace, hamstringing the @USEEOC—the agency responsible for protecting workers’ rights & safety—is absolutely the wrong message to send to women, to workers, and to businesses.
text: As our nation is grappling with how to address the epidemic of sexual assault & harassment in the workplace, hamstringing the @USEEOC—the agency responsible for protecting workers’ rights & safety—is absolutely the wrong message to send to women, to workers, and to businesses.

html: The @SenateGOP jammed through Republican nominees to the @NLRB without Mr. Pearce, the Democratic minority nominee—and they allowed one Senator to block Ms. Feldblum's nomination to the @USEEOC, meaning this critical civil rights agency was unable to do its most impactful work.
text: The @SenateGOP jammed through Republican nominees to the @NLRB without Mr. Pearce, the Democratic minority nominee—and they allowed one Senator to block Ms. Feldblum's nomination to the @USEEOC, meaning this critical civil rights agency was unable to do its most impactful work.

html: The @USEEOC and @NLRB are critical agencies responsible for helping protecting workers’ rights, and yet @SenateGOP were more interested in tilting the playing field even more in favor of corporations than providing the EEOC and the NLRB with balanced voices.
text: The @USEEOC and @NLRB are critical agencies responsible for helping protecting workers’ rights, and yet @SenateGOP were more interested in tilting the playing field even more in favor of corporations than providing the EEOC and the NLRB with balanced voices.

html: I also object to the Senate moving on Republican labor nominees without approving nominations for the @USEEOC and the @NLRB. Even though Chai Feldblum and Mark Pearce were highly qualified nominees and respected by their peers, @SenateGOP refused to give them a vote.
text: I also object to the Senate moving on Republican labor nominees without approving nominations for the @USEEOC and the @NLRB. Even though Chai Feldblum and Mark Pearce were highly qualified nominees and respected by their peers, @SenateGOP refused to give them a vote.

html: Whether you're the only woman on the board, or a janitor or a farm worker, and no matter your gender, race, religion, sexual orientation, or age, or whether you have a disability or are a veteran—you should be treated fairly, respectfully, and with dignity. #BeHEARDpic.twitter.com/o0YU6AaTT2 – at Dirksen Senate Building
text: Whether you're the only woman on the board, or a janitor or a farm worker, and no matter your gender, race, religion, sexual orientation, or age, or whether you have a disability or are a veteran—you should be treated fairly, respectfully, and with dignity. #BeHEARDpic.twitter.com/o0YU6AaTT2 – at Dirksen Senate Building

html: The #BeHEARD Act will: establish standards to strengthen harassment prevention in workplaces nationwide empower workers to come forward by providing new resources safeguard anti-discrimination laws so that ALL workers are protected under our civil rights lawspic.twitter.com/C0E23SZD1M
text:
The #BeHEARD Act will:
 establish standards to strengthen harassment prevention in workplaces nationwide
 empower workers to come forward by providing new resources
 safeguard anti-discrimination laws so that ALL workers are protected under our civil rights lawspic.twitter.com/C0E23SZD1M

html: There are millions of workers who aren't protected under our civil rights laws—and far too many are silenced by mandatory non-disclosure agreements. With the #BeHEARD Act, we want to shine a spotlight on these abuses of power across ALL industries.pic.twitter.com/BcD8bpoy7o – at Dirksen Senate Building

html: It’s far past time we: - close the loopholes in the Equal Pay Act - give women the tools and protections they need to ensure they are being paid fairly I hope that Senate Republicans can join us in supporting the #PaycheckFairness Act because this shouldn't be a partisan issue.
text:
It’s far past time we:
- close the loopholes in the Equal Pay Act
- give women the tools and protections they need to ensure they are being paid fairly

I hope that Senate Republicans can join us in supporting the #PaycheckFairness Act because this shouldn't be a partisan issue.

html: Women are the sole breadwinner in more than 40% of American families, meaning families have less money to: - pay for groceries & child care - support businesses in their communities - stay financially secure & independent This is why we must pass the #PaycheckFairness Act today.
text:
Women are the sole breadwinner in more than 40% of American families, meaning families have less money to:
- pay for groceries & child care
- support businesses in their communities
- stay financially secure & independent

This is why we must pass the #PaycheckFairness Act today.

html: The gender pay gap is even worse for women of color, and for every dollar white men make: - African American women working full-time only make 61 cents - Native American women only earn 58 cents - Latinas on average are paid 53 cents #EqualPayDay
text:
The gender pay gap is even worse for women of color, and for every dollar white men make: 
- African American women working full-time only make 61 cents 
- Native American women only earn 58 cents
- Latinas on average are paid 53 cents 

#EqualPayDay

html: It has been 50 years since Congress passed the Equal Pay Act—and while this was a strong step in the right direction—the sad reality is that today the gender wage gap still very much exists.

html: Patients should be able to expect that medical providers and health IT systems vendors will be good stewards of their health data. That means using sensitive information responsibly and empowering patients to control how and when their information is disclosed.
text: Patients should be able to expect that medical providers and health IT systems vendors will be good stewards of their health data. That means using sensitive information responsibly and empowering patients to control how and when their information is disclosed.

html: When we talk about making sure we have a strong health IT system, we aren’t just talking about technology and innovation—families’ lives depend on making sure we get this right.
text: When we talk about making sure we have a strong health IT system, we aren’t just talking about technology and innovation—families’ lives depend on making sure we get this right.

html: Today electronic health records help doctors across the country identify health problems sooner, avoid medication errors, and make decisions with more knowledge of a patient's medical history. We must continue working to make sure providers and patients can access helpful data.

We fight for the people who rely on #TitleX: 
- for access to contraception
- for access to STD testing
- for access to cancer screenings
- to understand what all their reproductive health options are—including their option for safe, legal abortion

#NoGagRule #SaveTitleX

html: The #FAMILYAct will: provide at least 12 weeks of #PaidLeave protect workers who are taking leave cover ALL working people & reflect a modern definition of family Workers shouldn't have to choose between taking care of their families & their job.
text:
The #FAMILYAct will:
 provide at least 12 weeks of #PaidLeave
 protect workers who are taking leave
 cover ALL working people & reflect a modern definition of family

Workers shouldn't have to choose between taking care of their families & their job.

html: The Healthy Families Act would give workers the flexibility they need to take up to 7 days of #PaidSickDays—not just when they’re sick, but also to care for a child or loved one to seek routine medical care to seek assistance related to domestic violence or stalking

The Healthy Families Act would give workers the flexibility they need to take up to 7 days of #PaidSickDays—not just when they’re sick, but also 
to care for a child or loved one
to seek routine medical care
to seek assistance related to domestic violence or stalking

html: The Vaccines for Children Program is a great example of investing in prevention. For 25 years now it has helped kids in low income families get shots at no cost. It has saved $1.6T, prevented 380M illnesses, & saved 860,000 lives—that’s more people than the population of Seattle.
text: The Vaccines for Children Program is a great example of investing in prevention. For 25 years now it has helped kids in low income families get shots at no cost. It has saved $1.6T, prevented 380M illnesses, & saved 860,000 lives—that’s more people than the population of Seattle.

html: Declining vaccination coverage rates are leading to preventable outbreaks. In Clark Co., WA, public health officials continue to respond to a measles outbreak. The immunization rate among children in that community is less than 70%—far below what is needed to keep families safe.
text: Declining vaccination coverage rates are leading to preventable outbreaks. In Clark Co., WA, public health officials continue to respond to a measles outbreak. The immunization rate among children in that community is less than 70%—far below what is needed to keep families safe.

html: Each case of measles isn’t just a concern for family members worried about loved ones—it’s a threat to neighbors and communities left to contain a contagious disease, a terror for parents with newborns who can’t get vaccinated, and a strain on our public health system.
text: Each case of measles isn’t just a concern for family members worried about loved ones—it’s a threat to neighbors and communities left to contain a contagious disease, a terror for parents with newborns who can’t get vaccinated, and a strain on our public health system.

html: The measles outbreaks in Washington state and across the country are a clear sign we have to do more to address vaccine hesitancy and make sure parents have the facts they need to understand the science: vaccines are safe, effective, and life-saving.
text: The measles outbreaks in Washington state and across the country are a clear sign we have to do more to address vaccine hesitancy and make sure parents have the facts they need to understand the science: vaccines are safe, effective, and life-saving.

html: Vaccines that protect against measles have been in use for over 50 years. We know they are safe, effective, and lifesaving.
text: Vaccines that protect against measles have been in use for over 50 years. We know they are safe, effective, and lifesaving.

html: Andrew Wheeler has proven where his loyalties lie: to advancing President Trump’s agenda that seeks to chip away at our environmental laws & jeopardize public health for families in WA & nationwide. I’m heading to the floor to vote NO on Mr. Wheeler’s confirmation to lead @EPA.
text:
Andrew Wheeler has proven where his loyalties lie: to advancing President Trump’s agenda that seeks to chip away at our environmental laws & jeopardize public health for families in WA & nationwide. 

I’m heading to the floor to vote NO on Mr. Wheeler’s confirmation to lead @EPA.

html: From WA’s landscapes & mountains, to our water, air, & other natural resources, it’s no secret the environment is important to our state’s economy & way of life. Confirming Andrew Wheeler to lead @EPA could put our health & future generations at risk—that’s why I’m voting NO.
text:
From WA’s landscapes & mountains, to our water, air, & other natural resources, it’s no secret the environment is important to our state’s economy & way of life. 

Confirming Andrew Wheeler to lead @EPA could put our health & future generations at risk—that’s why I’m voting NO.

html: Despite the Trump Administration’s inaction, I’m glad Congress has taken bipartisan steps to address the opioid epidemic, including two major pieces of legislation and an increase of $2.6 billion in new resources to combat opioid misuse disorder. There is much more to do.
text: Despite the Trump Administration’s inaction, I’m glad Congress has taken bipartisan steps to address the opioid epidemic, including two major pieces of legislation and an increase of $2.6 billion in new resources to combat opioid misuse disorder. There is much more to do.

html: Earlier this month the administration released its first ever National Drug Control Strategy. It contains nothing new. It identifies no funding needs. It's 20 pages long, and easily summarized in two words—not enough.
text: Earlier this month the administration released its first ever National Drug Control Strategy. It contains nothing new. It identifies no funding needs. It's 20 pages long, and easily summarized in two words—not enough.

html: The costs of the opioid crisis are also seen in health providers treating babies born addicted to opioids, kids placed in foster care, parents who have lost children to an overdose, and veterans in chronic pain who are struggling with addiction.

html: The Child Care for Working Families Act, which I reintroduced with Representative @BobbyScott, is big and bold—and will help children, families, and child care workers and educators across the country as well as our economy. #ChildCare4Allpic.twitter.com/B3TDIno0PA

 ensure parents have quality, affordable child care when they need it
 expand access to quality preschool
 ensure that teachers are paid at least a living wage so they can support themselves & their own families

#ChildCare4All
